title: Three killed in Hub accident - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KHUZDAR: Three people were killed in a road accident in Hub on Sunday, while a man was shot dead in Kalat that police believed was an outcome of a tribal feud.

In Hub, officials said, a fast-moving car crashed into a rickshaw, killing three people and injuring six others. The injured were transported to the district hospital.

Separately, armed assailants killed a man in Kalat and fled.

Police said the victim was identified as Muhammad Yousaf Jattak. They said the killing could be a result of a tribal feud.

Also on Sunday, two men were seriously injured on the National Highway near Kalat when a passenger coach struck their motorcycle.

Published in Dawn, July 14th, 2025
